fields_of_interest: Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: EU projects (under CIP – ENS4Care; H2020 & Erasmus+ - new upcoming projects); Education (DIR 55/CPD/European Professional Card); Workforce (Recruitment & retention/Migration & mobility); Quality & Safety (Health Systems Research – eHealth/patient empowerment/Community Care/Quality Standards/eSkills)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
a. To pursue and enhance nursing research as an element of professional excellence to benefit the health of the population in the EU & Europe. 
 
b. To use nursing research to influence EU policies. 
 
c. To promote evidence-based decision-making.
